name: Patricia McPhillips
text: Emily and Chris were on time,very professional and did everything that I asked for.  Our windows look outstanding,  the concrete patios ,the sidewalks look amazing and the house is sparkling. resp.text: Awesome! Thanks for the review Mrs Pat. I love to pass these along to our techs and most of all love happy customers. Let’s us know if you need anything at all.

text: Window Genie did a wonderful job cleaning our circular drive! I would definitely recommend them and plan on using them again!

text: They did a great job!! Will be using them again and again!!

text: Arrived on time and did an awesome job. My windows never looked this good !  Soft pressure washing did the job!  All of this after a Category 2 hurricane!  Exterior was covered with debris and salt,  I would absolutely recommend them

resp.text: Thanks so much you guys! So glad you enjoyed the house washing and window cleaning! Let us know if you ever need anything else.

name: Judy Faust
text: They put black out film on my windows, did a great job.

resp.text: Thanks for the awesome review Mrs. Judy. You have a beautiful view there in Gulf Shores and we would love to do work there anytime.

name: Sharon Wallace
text: This company was prompt, courteous, efficient and well priced!  They cleaned my gutters and I plan to have them back to clean my driveway.

resp.text: Thanks so much for the review Mrs. Sharon! We always appreciate feedback and will see you soon to clean that driveway.

name: Lloyd Gardner
text: They did a great job at a reasonable price

resp.text: Thanks Mr. Lloyd! We appreciate the review and keep us mind for any of your pressure washing or window cleaning needs.

name: Christian DeArco
text: Fast! Reliable! Great price!!!

resp.text: Awesome Christian! Thanks so much for the reviews.

name: Beth Sewell
text: Adam and his associate came out to clean the windows at our home on Lake Martin recently. They were very professional and did an outstanding job. The windows look so clear and beautiful now. We can really enjoy our view of the lake. Both gentleman were so kind; and went above and beyond. We will definitely recommend Adam and Sparkle Window Cleaning Service to our neighbors and friends. Thank you so much.    Beth and Susan

name: BC
text: David and Dillion did a great job of washing windows-inside and out. The windows had years of pollen and dirt build up. Also pressure washed the deck. Everything they washed/pressured wash looks almost new. I would definitely recommend this company.

name: Joel Cornett
text: Sparkle confirmed our appointment the day before and the guys showed up on time and immediately began the job.  They were courteous, professional and answered all of our questions.  They pointed out a couple of little problems with our windows (thanks so much) and finished the job in fairly short order.  The results are dramatic and we are pleased with the service.  We will definitely call them again and will recommend Sparkle to neighbors and friends.  Thanks for everything guys!

name: Cassie Ball
text: We’ve done business with Sparkle for a few years now.  Brett Bodine is very reliable and they do a wonderful job.   Adam did a fantastic job on our windows.

name: Kevin Porter
text: Sparkle was one of the only companies I reached out to that quickly came to give me a quote on cleaning the exterior windows of my house. Brett, the owner, was very kind and personable on the phone. Kendrick and Blake came out and were punctual and professional. They did a great job! We will continue to use Sparkle in the future.

name: Stacy Howorth
text: It is so nice to find a Company that actually exceeds your expectations! From the quote , communication and the actual work our experience with Sparkle was outstanding. Great Company to work with. Will definitely use again. The two technicians worked so hard for hours in intense heat! Made it look easy and always had a smile on their faces. I so appreciate their hard work!

name: Cheryl Chisholm
text: Kendrick and Matt came out and were outstanding! They were on time, they were prepared, they were fast - and the windows and screens are fantastic now!  More than that, not only were they courteous, they were friendly; they are outgoing and put me at ease instantly.  I have an old, toothless Chi and a blind and deaf small-breed mix; of course, I tried to keep them out of the way - but both of them treated my dogs so sweetly.  They didn’t really have to do that, as some companies insist your pets be shut away from them while their employees are at your home.  The company, from the time I initially called them until they were finished and leaving, was professional.  The owner came out that day to give me an estimate (that would be written up and sent to me electronically), which I received and approved electronically the next day.  Later that day, the owner called to set up a day for the work.  It was an experience I’d recommend to anyone needing the kind of services they offer.

name: Cheryl Hagopian Layne
text: Adam and Kendrick were punctual, personable, and professional! They possess a great work ethic and do quality work. I am so very pleased with my beautifully sparkling-clean windows and with the entire experience. Sparkle should be very proud of these two employees - they represent the company very favorably!

name: Scott Girard
text: Sparkle is the most professional and responsive window cleaning operation I have ever used. I had never seen or heard of the technology and procedures they use for window cleaning, and it is incredible. Brett and his team are all awesome.  I recommend Sparkle to anyone needing the services they provide.

name: Cathy Watson
text: Sparkle was great to work with, and got everything done that I asked them to do. The pressure washing makes such a difference and made the sidewalks and stone retaining walls look so much better. I will definitely use them again.

name: Will Cabaniss
text: This is my 2nd time using  Sparkle.  Very easy process throughout.  A rep called me to schedule the appointment and then called a day or 2 prior to confirm.  Just before the service began, the technician called to let me know they were on site and getting started.  Overall I am very pleased with this company and will use them again.

name: Jill Carswell
text: The guys did a great job! They even removed our patio furniture and put it back for us. Our patio, driveway and sidewalk look great! Would definitely use Sparkle again!

name: Ben DeVane
text: Andrew and Dillon arrived as scheduled and immediately went to work.  They did exactly as I instructed and worked non-stop until done.  The windows look great.  I'm always pleased with Sparkle Window Cleaning and will continue to use them.

name: Amy Stucky
text: Kendrick , Matthew and Dillon did a great job today cleaning our house windows.   Very professional and courteous !  Love my clean , sparkling windows.  Definitely recommend , very affordable.

name: Kelli Rice
text: Wow! Cannot recommend this company enough! David did an AMAZING job pressure washing our home (eaves & soffits, front & back porch, pool deck). Very professional and he made sure everything was put back into place. I will definitely be using them again!

name: Faye Andrews
text: Wow!  Arrived on time and went right to work. Explained what they would be doing. Professional, courteous, clean, neat, and put everything back like they found it. When they left,  the only way I knew they had been here is my windows truly sparkled! I would recommend to family and friends.

text: Each time I use Sparkle Window cleaning they do a wonderful job.  From setting up the appointment with their staff and the gentlemen that come to perform the services they are wonderful to work with ! Alex and Andrew did a great job with my window cleaning.  They are very professional and kind.  I will definitely use them again! It's nice to see my windows sparkle!

name: Jenny Fuqua
text: Will definitely be using Sparkle again! They did an amazing job on all of our windows…fast, professional, and GREAT result!! 5 star service!

David and Adam explained everything they were doing, they did a magnificent job on my windows, they alerted me to issues with a couple of windows, they cleaned up after themselves and made the whole process a pleasant one. Thank you for hiring a great staff!

name: Carrie Jo
text: Washing and brick was satisfactory. However, power washer removed soil down 2-3 inches around three sides of my raised patio. I spoke to Darren. Was too busy to stop by.  Said also had an overnight job. Did not seem too concerned. I had to fill it in myself.

resp.text: Good afternoon Mrs. Carol thanks for taking the time to leave a review of our services. We are glad that you are satisfied with the work we did on your buildings exterior, windows, and concrete. The rest of the review isn’t as accurate. You contacted us yesterday morning demanding that we come immediately to put dirt back around  bricks that you asked us to clean. The 2-3 inches of dirt that was “removed” was against the 2-3 inches of brick that you wanted cleaned on your patio. Meaning in order to clean your bricks, we would have to clean the dirt off that was against them. After you told me the problem, which was two days after we completed the project, I informed you that I would get by there to attempt to fix the issue even after knowing we did nothing but do our job. You hung up in my face immediately after me telling you that I couldn’t come in that very moment because we had work going on at the moment, and I like to finish jobs before I move on to something else. It would be very unprofessional of me to leave a customer’s house who paid in advance before I finished their property. Your call was at 10:44 a.m. and you left this review at 11:02 a.m., meaning you left this review before anything could be done to resolve the issue. It was a pleasure doing business with you from start to finish and this review is not an accurate depiction of our experience together. We have worked extremely hard to have a 100% satisfaction record. We have over 100 five star reviews between google and Facebook and have never received anything less than a 5 star in our 4 years of business. We hope to do business with you again one day. Thank you.

name: Sydney Ann
text:
I hired Prestige Power Washing to clean my parents home in preparations for the sale. I don't leave reviews but this company most definitely deserves recognition for most professional business I've ever hired.

After doing my research of other local Power and Soft Washing businesses reading these reviews here and on their Facebook page I realized I was dealing with a legit and knowledgeable business. After speaking to the owner about scheduling a in person quote I knew I also had made a great choice. They scheduled a quote that suited my schedule showed up on time and gave extensive information regarding there service and proper techniques they use that other companies don't use. This is when I decided this company was Most definitely my best choice for cleaning my house.

I'm so impressed with the outcome of the outside of the house and not only that but our realtor said "I've never seen such a difference this house looks like it was just painted"!  Just to add the best possible outcome our house was shown to the first family the next day and within 12 hours it was sold right here in Foley, Al.

***Please Don't hesitate to Hire this Company To Wash your home and concrete you won't regret it. ***

text:
John and crew were very careful to make sure power washing was not done to my brick because it had a special coating that would be ruined if blasted with a power washer. They also cleaned my whole house and roof with a special solution that got cleaner with every coming rain. It looks terrific.
They were efficient and courteous and checked back to ensure I was satisfied with their work. I had to wait a few weeks due to everyone still recovering from hurricane cleanup efforts of last year...but!...he is worth waiting for~
I'm thankful there are still a few honest, respectable, dependable businesses out there who aren't trying to take advantage of you.
This is a difficult (and sometimes dangerous) job and they have it down pat.

resp.text:
Thank you so much for your wonderful and detailed review of my services.

We look forward to working for you in the future and hope you’ll spread the word to family and friends about us!

text: First off...I rarely, and I mean RARELY, give "5 Stars" for anything because my expectations are of the utmost high. Mr. Brandon gets 5 FRESHLY POLISHED, GOLDEN STARS!!! I am BEYOND impressed at his workmanship! Not only was I impressed with the magnificent job he did with pressure cleaning our patio, sidewalks, and curbs but he went the extra mile in also cleaning the bottom bricks of our home...something that he was NOT required to do but I greatly appreciate it! He kept us educated and notified throughout the entire process, another quality that is hard to come by in a business that he possessed! Some companies will notice an issue and just leave it if they are unable to fix it. Not Mr. Brandon! Even though we had a MUCH bigger job for him than he anticipated (excess dirt, grass, super old oil spots) and it started to heat up outside, Mr. Brandon took his time to make sure that he cleaned EVERY LAST AREA that we needed him to take care of! Again, we GREATLY appreciate everything that you did for us today, Mr. Brandon! I hope that you get much needed rest after today's job! We'll recommend you to any and everybody that needs the services that you offer and you gotta promise me that you'll keep up the same EXCEPTIONAL work! 😄

text: I was almost mowed down by an employee. Their blatant disregard for the rules of operating a motor vehicle is sickening. He was on his phone speeding and used no blinker in a construction zone on the interstate and had the audacity to shoot me the bird when I honked to let him know I was on the road. Ridiculous and rude.

resp.text:
Good evening Juana, I want to apologize for the incident earlier. I felt bad for making that Mistake and almost causing an accident. I told my employees I know I scared whoever was in the vehicle and I actually said sorry and threw my hand up (even though you couldn't see me or hear me). I have children too, so I know the feeling even if it wasn't children involved everyone's life is precious and
valuable. I'm sorry for that.  I wasn't on the phone nor was I speeding I was coming on to the highway off the bypass my lane was running out I was near the end a truck had moved over, so I started to move over as well to get on to the highway and you were in my blind spot I didn't see you. I am not a reckless driver nor would I ever risk lives intentionally, i didn't see you in my blind spot I looked twice and was seeing my lane running out, so when the truck moved over to let me in that's when I proceeded to move over not knowing you were back there. I'm happy everyone was and is safe. I do understand your frustration, I would've been to and have been in that situation before. However, I do truly feel you can forgive me for a mistake like I forgave them.

name: Kelsey
text:
Called on Thursday and was told someone would be in touch shortly. I received a text asking for a call, which I did immediately only to get a voicemail. I also responded to the text! I called again on Friday to get no voicemail at all. I called again on Saturday to the main number. The call center had no idea why the responsiveness was so awful and was unable to be helpful. If they do business this way for potential customers, I doubt their actual service is any better. Managing incoming business should be the easy part. Customer service seems dead with this company.
Edit: Richard followed up after my review. He sent his guys the very same day! The men were very pleasant. They were quick and efficient. Thank you for owning this and making it better!

name: Joseph C. Kreps - Alabama Defense Attorney
text: Richard and his crew are the real deal.  My job was completed in June 2019.  Immediately upon inquiry, I spoke to Richard and could tell that he knew what he was talking about and was legit.  He came out almost immediately and gave a very honest and detailed estimate and made some very helpful suggestions.  They pressure washed both driveways, some areas of the house, back patio and everything else that needed it.  Here is the reason they have my highest and best recommendation - I needed Richard to clean some streaking off the gutters - he was very honest and told me what he thought he could do and told me that it might not work.  In the end, it worked perfectly and the gutters are almost good as new.  Also, the crew came back a 2nd day and I could tell that maybe the job was larger than first anticipated so I asked Richard to bill me more and he wouldn’t do it - he stood by his estimate and that means a lot.  I ended up adding some money to what I paid because he is the kind of business owner that goes above and beyond to satisfy and is a man of his word.  I love paying honest professionals for great work - you won’t go wrong choosing Richard and I Need Pressuring Washing.  Enjoy your clean, like-new, pressure-washed areas - I know we are enjoying ours!!!

resp.text: Joseph, I can't thank you enough for such an amazing review. Probably my favorite out of the 120 I've gotten so far. I appreciate the effort you made to sit down and write such a thorough take on my company. I look forward to cleaning your new home for many years to come. Thank you so much.

name: Lance Scardino
text:
Don't waste your time trying to buy or rent one of those do-it-yourself pressure washers.  You might save a little money, but your results will never compare to what Richard's crew can do.  And you'll soon find out that it's a much harder job than you thought it could be.  So the little bit of savings will actually cost you more since you'll likely later decide to have it professionally done anyway.  Or just contend with a mediocre job.

I Need Pressure Washing doesn't drive up with a pickup truck and pull out a portable type setup.  They have a fully enclosed professional high end system.  My driveway was washed, scrubbed and bleached.  Looks incredible.  I also had the 9 ft fence at my Mom's house cleaned.  It was full of mildew and the typical years worth of greying/blackening.  I never imagined that the fence would look like brand new wood.  Jeff was the worker for the two homes and he really pushed for perfection on both jobs.  I absolutely recommend I Need Pressure Washing for any of your pressure washing needs.

name: Doug Saxon
text: Richard, the owner of the company called me back immediately and was extremely professional.  Every response ended with a "sir".  I explained to him my cleaning needs and he confidently told me he could handle them and I would be amazed with the difference. Before I called, I looked at his website and was blown away by the before-after photos he has posted. I was also impressed by his A+ BBB record and his 45 reviews on Angie's List that were all A grade perfect. He told me that those results are very common and was confident he could do the same for me.  Let me just say, this company is amazing!  I was ready to tear down my deck but now it looks better than new.  My house was covered in mildew and spider webs and now my home looks as if it has been repainted.  The windows are bug free and look as if they were hand washed. He reluctantly talked me into cleaning my drive way.  He promised if I was not 100% satisfied, it would be free.  As much as I wanted a free cleaning I could not hide my enthusiasm when I walked out and saw the difference.  My concrete was actually bright white and not mildew black.  I am not sure what looks best, because it all looks amazing. Use this company and you will not be disappointed.

So you see he is not trying to make a quick buck.  8/8/2013.  Yesterday, 8/21/2013, at my referral, my brother had his house done.  He was very pleased.  This man is a kept secret.  Get on board.

They got the stains out, and my house looks better than ever. The old brick looks great, and everything else looks like it was just painted.  My patio, which used to be gray with streaks of black and green, is blindingly bright.  These guys were fast, thorough, and took care not to damage anything.  Their professional equipment, used with skill, really made a difference.

text:
Mr. Ropog (the owner) was able to give me a quote by looking at my home on Google Earth. That's actually pretty cool.

We needed a pressure washer because we are selling our house and don't really have the money to put into painting it. We were hoping pressure washing might help. Our house looked really old and run down due to all the mildew and dirt staining the light tan exterior paint. And the white concrete pool deck was actually gray, as was our front walk.

Mr. Ropog and another gentlemen pressure washed the entire house, pool deck and then he also washed a trellis, outside a/c unit, front walkway and our stone porch at no extra charge. Pretty awesome!

I took a walk around the house with him when it was all done and I was amazed at how great the house looks. It almost looks like it had a paint job. I am beyond thrilled and would recommend his services to anyone.

resp.text: Im very sorry I disappointed you. Im seriously overwhelmed with all aspects of this business and loose trac. Suffered much loss last year in many ways but business wise. I lost office personnel, Outside sales team. And let the crew go. We had no work.Its now just me and 2 part time employees and with me now having to be part of the crew on every job, maintaining all equipment including 5 trucks and all estimates and paper work I have a hard time keeping up with everything. My son was a huge part of the team. Its just me. Im very sorry I have let you down. It was not intentional. Trust me Im well aware I need to do a better job. I promise it was not intentional.

name: bamaguy006
text: There is a reason this business is not approved by Home Advisor.  Mr. Andy Hinson provides a fine service when he does the job, but he is exceedingly rude and unprofessional.  My wife and I were repeat customers and simply tried to get a quote for a return visit after he would spam our inbox with requests for his service.  Then, upon my suggesting he actually provide the quote and a discount for the over one-month wait he was telling me it would be before he could service us (from the day we first called), he got belligerent and quite angry - telling me that "no one tells me how to run my business".     I had a 5-star company with over 10 years experience and nothing but amazing reviews on Home Advisor signed up to do the house right away in a matter seconds.   You decide if this guy's skill set is worth the hassle.  This is a very replaceable service run by a poor businessman with how he treats repeat customers.  He implies that he works harder than everyone too and that his time is more valuable than yours (even when we run an Alzheimer’s and Parkinson’s research team working 80+ hrs a week to help find a cure). Avoid this poor businessman and his threatening demeanor.  Sad, because he does good work.

resp.text:
Dr. Caldwell,
I have been thinking a lot about our conversation on Friday and wanted to contact you in hopes of clearing the air between us. I want to start by  apologizing for my part in the direction the messages went. We pride ourselves on stellar customer relations with the main goal being 100% customer satisfaction. As you know, It’s a huge accomplishment in today’s world for a customer to have such confidence in your work that they ask you to return time and time again, therefore I want to express my gratitude to you and Mrs. Caldwell for your loyalty in years past.
I truly believe that the end result of our conversation on Friday was caused by a breakdown in communication. We all know the numerous ways that communication via text/email can be misunderstood, which is why i try to speak directly with my customers as often as I can. Unfortunately, this is not always possible for me because, as you’ve experienced in years past, we are a small operation and I am present on every project that we complete. That customer is paying for my time and in return, 100% of my focus is on providing them the quality they deserve. While this is fortunate for the customer, it is generally unfortunate for me as well as the potential customers that are in line or have needs that have yet to be met. I can assure that we are constantly looking for ways to improve and already have taken steps to circumvent these obstacles. With that being said, I would like to respectfully respond to your complaints and share with you a few steps we are taking in the evolution of our company.

- We have recently transitioned over to a new database setup in order to submit estimates, send invoices, schedule projects, send out reminders, etc. We will be reviewing the frequency of emails being sent very closely in the coming weeks and months to ensure no one is “spammed”. Until now our main focus in that area has been that our firewalls and malware are more than sufficient to keep our customers’ information safe.
- This is the first time it’s happened, but your request for proposal slipped through the cracks with this new system we are implementing. I will not allow any potential customer, especially repeat customers, to have to wait 9 days to receive an estimate. Again, one of the kinks we are working out. I was attempting to remediate this by telling you that I would be giving estimates the following day (due to the threat of severe weather we had to cancel a large commercial job) and would be certain to get you a proposal.
- Meanwhile, In an attempt to be as open as possible about scheduling the potential work, I simply stated that we currently have a 2 week lead time from proposal acceptance to work completion. I let everyone know how long it could be before I start because EVERY CUSTOMER is equally important to us, and we schedule work on a first come, first serve basis.
- There is only one other exterior cleaning company in Tuscaloosa that operates on the level that we do (experience, revenue, insurance coverage, etc.) and, as you can imagine, “Spring Cleaning” is our busiest time of the year. As of today, both companies have a lead time of 3+ weeks from proposal acceptance to project completion. It is against our policy to offer discounts simply because we are not willing to move someone to the front of the line, just as you wouldn’t appreciate someone being placed in front of you.
- We do not, & have never, paid for membership into a “contractor referral” website, such as homeadvisor.com. Instead, we choose to rely on other methods of advertising while also investing a large portion into additional certifications, continuing education, etc. We are glad that you were able to find another contractor so quickly through home advisor and wish you all the best in dealing with that contractor. I would love the opportunity to speak with you personally and more in depth on this matter. Please send your contact info to andy@alabamaprowash.com. Thank you

text: I received a gift card for an interior detail and now I wish I would have used it sooner! Do not let the location of this shop fool you! I forgot to show the gentleman that cleaned my car what I was considering to be my worry spots, when I got my car back he clearly saw the same spots that I was seeing and the inside of my car looks brand new! Definitely check them out.

name: Erika Brooks
text: I'm by no means an expert at auto detailing so I'm unsure how to rate properly BUT when I received my car, I thought it looked very clean and well done. I was getting my car ready to sell so I got the complete detail. The vacuuming was very nice. The only places I saw any kind of debris were some spots under the seats that would require removing the seat in order to clean and that is unrealistic. The wash, wax, and wipe down of everything was nicely done. The seats were shampooed and the cleaning of the seats were great but I would suggest getting a plastic film to put on the seats in case they are still damp. Mine were slightly moist (which I understand they won't completely dry in 4 hours) and when I got home my clothes were also a little moist but this isn't a rating breaker for me. I have a white dog that sheds a lot so I was impressed that they were able to clean the car well enough to where I only saw a couple of straggler hairs around the car. The only thing I did not like was when I got there at 7:00 am, I was greeted by an employee that had no idea about my appointment so I had to re-explain everything and that wasn't a professional first impression in my eyes. Other than that, I think the car turned out great!

name: Stephanie Newton
text:
I have never been to Rocket City Buffing & Auto Detailing or had my car professionally cleaned. I called ahead of time to ask some questions and spoke to Sylvester. He answered all of my questions and was very polite.

When I arrived, the staff were all friendly and I left my car to have a full detail. I was very happy with the results! The car is super shiny! I had a lot of old stains in the seats and they were able to get most of them out and the others look much lighter. They even removed tar stains from underneath the car that had been there for over a year without me asking for it first. The interior is spotless and the wax looks awesome! They even cleaned the engine compartment and the wheel well.

I have already recommended them to my friends and will definitely be back! Thanks!

Sylvester and his buddy did a very good job in cleaning interior and exterior of my car. When I raised a concern regarding my car headlights a couple of days after my car was taken care of, they took it back for redoing it and returned with better results. Very soft spoken and responsive. They provided car pick up and delivery services.

I would definitely go back there whenever I need their service next time.

Why I took 1 star off: A very minor residual stains in the interior of roof and passenger seat (which could very well be resistant to cleaning). But overall, a very good job.

name: Maci Cobble
text: Service was awful very unprofessional when my home dried it was dirt still on my home. When I called to express my concern he cursed me out and yelled and also over talked me. Told me had to educate me like I was a child. When I asked could he comeback he told me NO!! Or give me half of my money back he refuse. Remind you he was 5hrs late from my appointment time. I refuse to use service again and do not recommend his business to anyone.

resp.text:
Hello Ms. Cobble,
Throughout our 10 years of being in business our company has always maintained a professional standard in conduct and workmanship. The interaction that you have detailed is very contrary to what our records indicate. While our technician did arrive late due to some issue with our equipment, he in fact communicated same.  At the time, you indicated that, that was in fact ok.
Whenever we engage prospective customers whether over the phone or in person we always go over their expectations i.e. what they want cleaned and how they would like to see it look. We are then able to guide their expectations based on our own expertise. In your interaction with our technician, Martez, he indicated that your home was in fact badly oxidized and that with pressure washing it may become more evident in some parts than others. He further explained that oxidation is not caused by pressure washing  but in your case it was because of aging paint.  At the end of the service, you indicated that everything was in fact 5 star quality and you did leave a 5 star review to indicate such. It is therefore, quite unsettling that weeks later, you would call making such accusations about our professionalism and conduct thus purposely defaming our company.
With that said, we cannot stand responsibility for an issue for which our workman was not culpable. We are truly sorry that we were not able to come to an amicable resolution.

name: Kyle Nichols

name: L Mcc
text:
Testimonial:

Tsunami pressure washing transformed my two houses from dull, almost unnoticeable dwellings, to becoming the standouts on our block. Tsunami pressure washed my brick home, the driveways, and sidewalks. Who knew that we would become two of the most beautiful homes on the block. Our houses which both sit on the corner are head turners because of Tsunami. They are now turning the heads of neighbors, visitors, and passing cars because of the clean, beautiful, and stately appearance of our properties. Tsunami is our only choice for pressure washing. Tsunami's service moved our property from diamond in the rough to two very precious jewels.The proof is in the outcome...sheer perfection. I recommend Tsunami to transform your personal residences or your investment properties. They will give your property the face-lift it deserves to sell or rent quickly, or to just personally enjoy. Thank you Tsunami for such a great job.

L. McCauley
Formidable Group LLC

name: Angela Hancock
text:
Taking on a major home improvement project always feels like gambling to me. Will I pick the right product, style, company to do the work. So many decisions! It's tough. Well, I won the jackpot! 360 painting was a definite win for me. Brent Edwards, the owner, was professional, friendly, and gave a great price. He even went beyond and re screened my sitting area in the process. The person he sent was Heath. Heath was kind, professional and is a very knowledgeable painter. His work ethic was exceptional, considering it was 95 to 100 degrees every day. He managed to work thru that heat and didn't even take a lunch break!
My house looks great and I would recommend this company without exception.

resp.text: Hi Angela, it was such a pleasure for us here at 360° Painting Vestavia Hills to work with you. We hope to see you in the future!

name: shaheen upton
text: Brent is extremely difficult to work with. He kept giving us the runaround and after several weeks of constantly pushing the job back for various reasons, we finally had to let him know we were going to find another painter. Unfortunately, we had already paid him for half the job even though he had completed less than a fourth. it was obvious that he had never really worked on a large job. I would not recommend using him!

resp.text: I must say I strongly disagree.  Neither owners were ever onsite except Mrs. Shaheen once to meet me us there.  Mr. Shaheen (project manager of the job) never once met me at the property and we were told to facetime them if myself or the painters needed anything.  We were contracted to paint the walls and ceilings only after drywall contractors finished.  The drywall was poorly done and we would have had to go back and finish up that contractors job.  Our painters are extremely skilled and neither of them would paint as it wasn't ready to paint.   I was onsite and sent pictures and texts explaining it wasn't ready but owners at one point has multiple contractors in the office at the same time.   We decided to part ways.   I wish everyone all  the best.

text: They were scheduled to come out to my house 9:30 Thruday Nov.7th a.m for popcorn ceiling. Instead they called me and asked me if I can send them a pic of my issue and they would make their assessment that way. When I asked what happened to someone coming out and giving me an estimate, the guy representing the company(Brent Edwards) said they had a project to do at the same time the company were suppose to come to my house, taking the pic and sending it to them(by phone) will give them a visual of what needed to be done and they will quote a price from there. So I send them the pics after about a hour or so, my wife told me "maybe you should call them. I called them and the guy representing  the company(Brent Edwards)told me he will give me an estimate after his lunch. I'm like really !!! I told my wife he wasn't going to call us back and he didn't. Now this wasn't professional from the beginning. How are you not going to inform us about another project that you took on or u forgot about. Let alone you never acknowledged this over the phone. When I did bring it up you wanted me to send a pic so u can call me with an estimate which u never did. Poor Customer Service and a lack of trust from this company.

resp.text: Anthony please be honest as I spoke with your wife for 15 minutes over the phone as I was in route.  I've never met or talked to you before.   Weather was awful and I asked since it was two popcorn ceilings and I was 45 miles away we felt that was just fine to send two pictures for an estimate. Please communicate realistic facts sir given the weather situation at the time.   Thank you

name: Misty Dyer
text: I called Friday May 24th to find out when our lawn was going to be serviced. The owner's wife Traci said she just stepped away to run some errands and she would call me back. She did about a hour later and said someone no longer works there and we were skipped. I told her our yard looks horrible since it has not been cut since May 2nd and I know when they are there because of the camera. I then asked when they were going to be coming out and she said the earliest would be this Wednesday, since they were done for whichthe week. That  would have made it nearly a month which is totally unexceptable. She then told me that they have long standing customers that have to be taken care of and I responded I am a paying customer as well and she said all their customers need to be taken care of. The owner sent me a message Saturday stating the entire yard would be taken care of Tuesday. It is sad when you pay someone to do a job and it is half done or not at all. Pretty much after each time they cut our lawn I would have to call because they didn't weed eat the fence line or cut the easement as agreed upon. I will not ever recommend them or use them again. If there was a way to add the pictures I took today of my lawn I would so do it. Horrible business!!😠

The crew he sent was a pleasure to work with, hardly even knew they was outside.

name: Jacob (Jake) Wilson
text: Quality service! We needed gutters on the back side of our house and reviews were good for All Around The House, so we decided to contact for an estimate. Mark came out while we were away and gave us an accurate estimate for lower than we were thinking, so we booked a time for him to come out and install. We only needed a small amount of gutters, but Mark and his team came out and completed the job within a couple of hours with no problem. We will definitely be using them again for any more house projects!

name: Pam Jones
text: I cannot say enough good things about All Around The House. I was in need of someone to assemble two pieces of furniture and did an internet search to find someone in my area. I found All About The House, left a voice mail, and within minutes Stephen returned my call. Luck was on my side as he had some time that same day to help me out. He and Kayla arrived on time, and they quickly got to work assembling the furniture. They worked fast but did a very thorough job, even disposing of the boxes and trash after completion. They were friendly, capable, and the price was very fair and reasonable. You never know what you are going to get when you blindly reach out to someone, and I could not be more pleased with my experience with All Around The House. I highly recommend them for your home needs!

name: Paul Fife
text: They did a beautiful job with my house I had them paint inside and outside I will have them come back and do more work for me very soon

text: They were very responsive. They gave me a similar estimate to another company, who never bothered to come back, but with a lot more work for the same price. The crew was quick, neat, and professional. I had them screen in a small patio and paint the walls, and it looks wonderful.

name: Jason Davis
text: Called Gulf Coast Pressure Washing on 16th of April 2015 to see about a quote for pressure washing my house as well as my metal roof.  They called me back on the 17th to inform me that a technician would be at my house on the 18th (Saturday) to gather the information needed for the quote. On the 18th of Apr, I received a text stating the technician would not be out to my house until the following Monday. No biggie.  Well Monday came and went, same for Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday as well. On Friday (24th of April 2015), I called to see why they had not informed me of the quote and if this is the way they normally treat potential customers. The young lady who answered informed Rebecca ( her customer service skills are lacking, will explain in a few) and she tried to tell me they had called me that week as well as emailed me the quote. I tried to inform her I had not received the call and even scrolled back through my call log to ensure I had not missed their call, well no call logged. Next, Rebecca said  had talked to Mark and they were going to pass on my doing business with me and that they had emailed my quote earlier that week to an email address in which she read to me. While I was attempting to tell her THAT WAS THE WRONG EMAIL ADDRESS, and reason I never received the quote, she with an attitude said , "Have a nice day" and hung up on me.   Now, due to their errors/mistakes, whatever you want to call it, they have LOST a potential repeat client. I will gladly take my business somewhere else. They are RUDE, HAVE NO CUSTOMER SERVICE SKILLS AND I GUESS CANNOT TAKE GOOD NOTES and I GUESS THEY BELIEVE THEY DO NOT NEED NEW CUTOMERS. If that is the case good for them, but given the fact they had incorrect information and tried to blame me the customer, I would not do business with them EVER.  P.S. I even replied to the text they sent me, to inform them they had sent the quote to the wrong email address (they left out 2 key pieces of the email addy), yet to receive A REPLY, I guess they think they don't make mistakes.

resp.text:
We take great pride not only the quality of our work but our outstanding customer service. It is unfortunate this potential customer did not have a pleasant experience. However, the story is not entirely correct. We did send the quote as promised but unfortunately we had written down the email address incorrectly (our mistake).  Rebecca did call a couple days after the quote was sent but was unable to reach him. When Mr Davis called today he was very upset and unpleasant. We try to treat all of our customers with the utmost respect and are pleasant to all. We also expect to be treated in the same manner by our customers or potential customers. When this does not happen we simply choose not to work with this person. We want everyone to have a pleasant experience including ourselves.
For a more accurate representation please check out our reviews on Angie's List and Home Advisor. We have been the Superior Service Award Winner for 2012, 2013 & 2014

name: S Colbert
text:
I was a first time customer to Elite Car Spa. I took my vehicle here as recommended by a trusted friend. I purchased the highest level service they provided (well over $200), a "full detail" as they said. I had my vehicle there a full day with no pressure to have it done at any certain time, as i wouldn't be able to pick it up until i was out of work, well after they had closed. Upon arrival to pick it up, I was immediately concerned. It seemed as if they overlooked quite a few obvious areas. The front-end still had smashed insects and debris on it that easily came off with my fingernail. That lead me to look even closer. Using a flashlight, I noticed quite a few areas where wax was never removed, where hopefully condensation, and not unrinsed soap, dripped down, leaving behind hazy but obvious lines across the paint. The interior of my vehicle was outstanding, with the exception of the entire front winshield being ignored and unclean. I am just disappointed. I apologize in !
advance for not having enough faith in this shop to bring my vehicle back there, even for them to correct these issues. I do believe that this may be the best place in town for a basic car wash, but i would not reccomended them to someone expecting expertly trained, skillful, adept work or to even get what they paid for. Even if they in fact paid for the best the have to offer.

resp.text:
We're sorry to hear that you were not satisfied with the services provided.
There are several issues you addressed. Unfortunately, we dont have an S.Colbert in our customer database making it difficult to know what vehicle you are referring to and unable to review your account.
We're glad you were pleased with the interior work done in your vehicle. As for exterior work, bugs can etch into your clear coat and without having your vehicle buffed it would seem rough. Picking up your vehicle at night, when condensation builds up, does make it difficult to see.  Not to say there wasn't an issue as we are human. However, we pride ourself on our work and professionalism.
We love feedback from our customers. On rare occasions when a customer is not satisfied we do go above and beyond to make sure to rectify any issues. It is unfortunate you don't feel comfortable enough to bring your vehicle back to us as we would have done everything we could to make sure you were 100% satisfied.
We are far more than a basic car wash and our staff is trained and quite skilled.
We hope you call and give us an opportunity to rectify this situation.

name: Jim dunn
text:
The appearance of the 2nd floor on the front and side of my 2-story frame house had been bugging me for months.  The north and west sides of the house were covered with a black mold, especially on the north side.  I tried bleaching this mold off myself with my pump hand-sprayer, but it was a no-go.

In mid-October, 2019, I searched on-line for pressure washer businesses who could do this cleaning job and found "All Clean Outdoor Solutions, LLC.  Their reviews from customers were very good, so I called them and set up an appointment.  Rachael and Tracy came out on the day and time we agreed on and gave me an estimate. The price was reasonable so we set up a time for the house to be cleaned.

Tracy began work on the house a day or two later with very satisfactory results.  For our house, it took him between 2-3 hours to finish the job.  Now, that the front of the house is cleaned and looking good, we need the back deck of the house cleaned as well, so I'm planning on giving them a call for that, as well.  They used a 'soft wash' process on my house as pressure washing is sometimes hard on the paint.  They also clean driveways, bricks, roofs, and most types of outdoor cleaning, so they're a 'one-stop' shop!!  I'm glad I found them.

resp.text: Mr. Jim Thank you for trusting us with your project and secondly, we deeply appreciate the kind words to us and about the process. We do strive to provide amazing customer service and leave your projects, no matter what they are, as you'd imagined or even better! We look forward to that call for future work too.

They both worked so hard and did a beautiful job on replacing my sub floors. I am thrilled to have these two help me with future projects!

name: Jason Sharp
text: Called to get an estimate. Set the appointment for a specific date and time and no one showed and no one called. Even a day later, not call. Not a good sign. resp.text: I am seeing this for the first time today Jason. I'd sent you an e-mail reply prior to this I believe once I'd seen you'd e-mailed us about our mistake. Your complaints were warranted although it wasn't our typical situation. We do depend on word of mouth and great customer experiences to propel our still-growing, young company. I do apologize for your experience although I know that isn't typical of us. You and I have had other conversations since then and hopefully I delivered a better communication to you then. I hate we weren't able to work together this time Jason but perhaps in the future if you've got exterior cleaning or building needs(we only personally build & restore wooden fences/decks as the rest is subbed) maybe you will call us back. I'd lack integrity to deny that we made a mistake so again I apologize for that. Thank you for being honest and giving us an opportunity to improve.

text: Ridiculous. First, you play phone tag with a person for a day then they want to come and measure each square foot of carpet to be cleaned which required me to drive 30 miles to the home,which in the end was a waste of time. Then because a 10 foot square area of carpet had some heavy staining this person proceeds to give me an at least $1000 estimate and several days away till job is done! I dont care what you do to a carpet you're not going to get all the stain down into the pad out I don't care what someone tells you,short of replacement. Charging attorney fee rates is ridiculous, you're cleaning carpet for 2 or 3 hours without going to law school for 6 to 8 years. In my opinion he just didn't want to do the job. Also wanted like $1.15 a sq. ft to clean tile with over 500 ft. to be done. Again, it ain't that difficult and those prices must be from New York or Cali. After the rigamaroll I contacted another carpet cleaner,gave the number of rooms and approximate area to be cleaned OVER THE PHONE and they were out that afternoon, did a good job in 3 hours all for about $300.
